title: My typography scrapbook
content:
I don’t think I can praise [Evernote](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012064103/http:/www.evernote.com/) enough. You’d have to give me a lot of time anyway. Among the many uses I have for it, one of them is keeping a scrapbook of everything typographically interesting I come across. If you’d like, you can explore it here:

[http://www.evernote.com/pub/mrh/typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012064103/http:/www.evernote.com/pub/mrh/typography "http://www.evernote.com/pub/mrh/typography")

Or, you can grab the rss feed for it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012064103/http:/feeds.feedburner.com/evernotetypography).

I update it on a highly irregular basis.
author: mads
